trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time it is raining in the location of the specified device.
This Trigger fires every time your specified device uploads data to the server.
This Trigger fires every time the temperature is below a level set by you.
This Trigger fires every time the device you chose uploads new image. Note that this Trigger won't fire at night when the camera is off.
This Trigger fires at the specific time set by you each day with a picture at that time from your selected device.
This Trigger fires every time the temperature exceeds a level set by you.
This Trigger fires when your specified device's time-lapse is ready, with a url of the time-lapse.
